original_text: And someone from the crowd answered him, “Teacher, I brought my son to you, for he has a spirit that makes him mute.
korean_text: 무리 중의 하나가 대답하되 선생님 말 못하게 귀신 들린 내 아들을 선생님께 데려왔나이다

sentences.original_text: And someone from the crowd answered him
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 무리 중의 한 사람이 그에게 대답하여

sentences.original_text: I brought my son to you,
